synthesis_method: 75 g each of lithium chloride (LiCl) and lithium bromide (LiBr) powders are pulverized, mixed for 6 hours, filled into a carbon container, heated in a tubular electric furnace at a rate of 200°C/h under flowing hydrogen sulfide gas (H2S), and fired at 500°C for 4 hours to produce a solid electrolyte.
